WOULD THAT MAKE YOU HAPPY? IT'S GETTING FUCKING OLD, I MEAN IT'S REALLY A SIMPLE QUESTION, BUT NOOOO, IM BILL AND INSTEAD OF ANSWERING A SIMPLE QUESTION ASKING HOW I FEEL AT THE MOMENT, I AM GOING TO ANSWER SOMEBODY WHO SAID THAT THEY KEEP LOSING THEIR SOCKS, WHICH, MIGHT I ADD, THAT'S NOT EVEN A GODD DAMN QUESTION !!!!!!!!! HALF OF THESE QUESTIONS ARE NOT EVEN QUESTIONS, AND YET HERE I AM, SOME POOR SHMUCK WHO IS JUST WONDERING HOW YOU ARE DOING, AND YOU JUST DONT CARE TO ANSWER ME BECAUSE IT'S TOO MUCH TO TELL SOME RANDOM PERSON HOW I AM DOING TODAY!!!!
